item.title: Career
item.description: Current Jun 2019 - Present : Currently working for Bank of America Continuum as Senior Technical Associate. As a fullstack developer, my work involves: Creating frontend using Angular 8 framework. Developing Service side using Spring boot framework. Creating BPMN using Camunda BPMN. Working with Relation DB (Oracle SQL Server). Past Experience Jan 2019 - Jun 2019 : Worked for Qfrog Logistics Pvt Ltd as Software Development Intern. As an intern, my work involves:

item.title: Projects & Skills
item.description: Github My Skills Programming Languages: Python(2.7/3.x), Java(1.8), PHP, TypeScript/JavaScript, C/C++. Framework: Flask, Angular, React, Spring boot OS: Windows(7,10), Linux(Fedora,Ubuntu) IDE: Intellij idea, JetBrains PyCharm, Eclipse Mars/Oxygen, Visual Studio Code Projects Binary Differentiator using Neural Network: Binary Differentiator employes a neural network to make decision between binary choices. It doesn’t uses any library like tensorflow or keras or pytorch. It uses basic numpy library for mathematical calculations.
